name: Stick Brave 2
description:
Enjoy the db legends gaming experience, relive the anime action with cool Stickman Z, but with a difference: the nostalgia battle system, which bring you back to the childhood arcade game.
Anybody can play and fight like legendary warrior. Choose your favorite, use your skill, crush the enemies and conquer the League!

Game Feature:
- Super Simple - Easy to learn fighting mechanism to control your favorite DBL fighter.
- Unique heroes, with unique ability - 20+ stickman fighter characters with unique design style and special signature skill. Test your limit with special attack, unleash fierce combos and devastate your enemies.
- A variety of content - 30+ maps in story mode to immerse yourself in the life of a mortal dragon fighter A to Z.
- Amazing Stick Graphic - Transform to your super fighter SSJ in a dbgt battle - fight to the death.
- Many more features that you will find out in game. Stick Brave is continuously updated.

Do you have what it takes to kick, punch, jump, and win beam clash to pass the gate to victory? There’s only one way to find out.
Stick Brave Warriors Fight - Download for free! May the battle begin!
